perturbation.original_text: During the period beginning on the Effective Date and ending on December 31, 2018 (the "Development Term"), each Party (the "Offering Party") agrees to provide to the other Party (the "Receiving Party") a right of first offer with respect to any proposed offer or arrangement, which the Offering Party (or its affiliate) desires to accept, under which the Offering Party or one of its affiliates would acquire the ownership of real property in the Market Area (the "Development Property") on which a Hyatt All-Inclusive Resort would operate (a "Development Opportunity").
perturbation.changed_text: Each Party (the "Offering Party") agrees to provide to the other Party (the "Receiving Party") a right of first offer with respect to any proposed offer or arrangement, which the Offering Party (or its affiliate) desires to accept, under which the Offering Party or one of its affiliates would acquire the ownership of real property in the Market Area (the "Development Property") on which a Hyatt All-Inclusive Resort would operate (a "Development Opportunity").
perturbation.explanation: By removing the 'Development Term' definition, later references to it in the contract are now ambiguous and unenforceable. For example, Section 2 refers to 'Development Term' which no longer has a definition.

perturbation.original_text: Any notice required under this Agreement to be given by either Party to the other Party shall be in writing in the English language. Any required notice shall be effective two business days after it is sent by a recognized international courier service to the address of the other Party stated in this Agreement, or such other address as shall be notified to the other Party in writing, and any receipt issued by the courier service shall be conclusive evidence of the fact and date of sending of any such notice.
perturbation.changed_text: Any notice required under this Agreement to be given by either Party to the other Party shall be in writing. Any required notice shall be effective when sent to the address of the other party, or such other address as shall be notified to the other Party in writing.
perturbation.explanation: By removing the specifics of 'English Language' and 'recognized international courier service' this now contradicts the listed contact details which are exclusively in English and dependent on a verifiable means of delivery.

perturbation.original_text: The arbitrator(s) may not award damages in excess of compensatory damages or otherwise in violation of the waiver in this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: The arbitrator(s) may award damages in alignment to local laws.
perturbation.explanation: By replacing the waiver of non-compensatory damages, this now creates an internal contradiction as it clashes with section 14 (Waiver of Non-compensatory Damages), this undermines the enforceability of the entire damages clause.
